name: Palo Alto Cortex XDR
description: This app integrates with the Palo Alto Cortex XDR

actions.description: Callback action for the on_poll ingest functionality

container_id.description: Container IDs to limit the ingestion to

start_time.description: Start of time range, in epoch time (milliseconds)

end_time.description: End of time range, in epoch time (milliseconds)

container_count.description: The maximum number of container records to query for

artifact_count.description: The maximum number of artifact records to query for

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
List all the endpoints/sensors configured on the device
Get the policy name for a specific endpoint

endpoint_id.description: Endpoint ID to get the policy name for

actions.description: Retrieve the status of the requested actions according to the action ID
Retrieve files from a specified endpoint

endpoint_id.description: Endpoint ID to retrieve the files for

actions.description: View the file retrieved by the Retrieve File action according to the action ID

action_id.description: Action ID of the file retrieval action

actions.description: Quarantine file on a specified endpoint

endpoint_id.description: Endpoint ID where the file is present

file_path.description: Path of the file you want to quarantine

file_hash.description: Hash of the file you want to quarantine

actions.description: Restore a quarantined file on a specified endpoint

file_hash.description: Hash of the file you want to restore

endpoint_id.description: Endpoint ID to restore the file

actions.description: Add a hash that does not exist in the allow or block list to a block list

file_hash.description: File hash in SHA256 to be added to the block list

incident_id.description: Incident ID related to the file hash

actions.description: Add files that do not exist in the allow or block list to an allow list

file_hash.description: File hash in SHA256 to be added to the allow list

incident_id.description: Incident ID related to the file hash

actions.description: Run a scan on selected endpoints

first_seen.description: When an endpoint was first seen

last_seen.description: When an endpoint was last seen

isolate.description: If an endpoint has been isolated

scan_status.description: Scan status of an endpoint (select from defined values)

actions.description: Cancel the scan of selected endpoints

endpoint_id.description: Endpoint ID to cancel the scan

first_seen.description: When an endpoint was first seen

last_seen.description: When an endpoint was last seen

ip_list.description: IP Address to cancel the scan for

isolate.description: If an endpoint has been isolated

scan_status.description: Scan status of an endpoint (select from defined values)

actions.description: Get a list of incidents filtered by a list of incident IDs, modification time, or creation time

modification_time.description: Modification time of the incident in timestamp epoch milliseconds

creation_time.description: Creation time of the incident in timestamp epoch milliseconds

status.description: Status of the incident to be searched (select from defined values)

search_from.description: Starting offset within the query result set from which you want incidents returned

search_to.description: End offset within the result set after which you do not want incidents returned

actions.description: Get extra data fields of a specific incident including alerts and key artifacts

alerts_limit.description: The maximum number of related alerts to be returned

actions.description: Get a list of alerts with multiple events

alert_source.description: The source which detected the alert

severity.description: The severity of the alert to be searched (select from defined values)

creation_time.description: Creation time of the alert in timestamp epoch milliseconds

search_from.description: Starting offset within the query result set from which you want incidents returned

search_to.description: End offset within the result set after which you do not want incidents returned
